item.title: Auburn Folsom Road North at Lincoln Way/Maple St.
item.description: Auburn Folsom Road North at Lincoln Way (To CA-49) and Maple St. (To I-80)

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-120 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-49 South/CA-120 East. Distance to Groveland, Coulterville, and Yosemite.

item.title: CA-120 East Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-120 East approaching CA-49 in Chinese Camp.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-89 North at Split
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 north split. CA-89 turns left here towards Calpine, Graeagle, Blairsden, and Quincy.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South - Sattley
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-49 South in Sattley.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road
item.description: CA-89 North/CA-49 South at Westside Road to Beckwourth and Portola.

item.title: CA-89 North at CA-49
item.description: CA-89 North at CA-49. CA-89 north joins CA-49 south to Sattley.

item.title: CA-89 North Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-89 north at CA-49. Use CA-49 north for Loyalton. Use CA-49 South/CA-89 North for Quincy and Downieville.

item.title: US-50 West at CA-49
item.description: US-50 west at CA-49. Use CA-49 north for Auburn; south for Jackson. US-50 through downtown Placerville is a surface street.

item.title: US-50 West at Coloma St.
item.description: US-50 west at Coloma St. exit.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 119B and Exit 119C
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 119B - CA-49/Grass Valley/Placerville. Approaching Exit 119C - Elm Ave. Overhead for I-80 to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 119A and Exit 119B
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 119A - Auburn/Maple St. and Exit 119B - CA-49/Grass Valley/Placerville.

item.title: CA-49 South/CA-89 North Split
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 north split. CA-89 turns left here towards Calpine, Graeagle, Blairsden, and Quincy.

item.title: CA-89 North/CA-49 South
item.description: CA-49 South/CA-89 North shields north of Sierraville.

item.title: CA-49 South at CA-89
item.description: CA-49 south at CA-89 south to Truckee. CA-89 north joins CA-49 south to Sattley.

item.title: CA-49 South - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on CA-49 south to Loyalton and Sierraville.

item.title: CA-49 South
item.description: First CA-49 shield south of CA-70.

item.title: CA-70 West at CA-49 South
item.description: CA-70 west at CA-49 south to Loyalton. This is the northern beginning of CA-49 which goes through the California Gold Country.

item.title: CA-70 West Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-70 west approaching CA-49 south.

item.title: CA-70 West Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-70 west approaching CA-49 south to Loyalton.

item.title: I-80 West at CA-49/Grass Valley Exit
item.description: I-80 west at CA-49/Grass Valley/Placerville. Overheads for next two exits, and I-80 to Sacramento.

item.title: I-80 West at Elm Ave. Exit
item.description: I-80 west at Elm Avenue exit, approaching CA-49/Grass Valley/Placerville.
